caption:
This image captures a leisurely scene at a lake during what seems to be a warm day. In the foreground, a person is paddling a small, inflatable orange boat through the water. The calm and glossy surface of the lake reflects subtle ripples around the boat. 

At the center of the photograph, a wooden raft floats on the lake, hosting a group of six people. The group appears engaged in casual conversation or perhaps preparing for a swim. They are dressed in swimwear which suggests the recreational nature of their gathering.

The background features a lush lakeside setting with dense trees. Across the lake, a slightly blurred landscape with houses partially hidden by foliage can be observed, giving a sense of a secluded and peaceful residential lake area. The soft focus and the tranquility of the scene emphasize a relaxed, summertime atmosphere, typical of a lakeside retreat.
title: Here at Clinton, in the first quarter mile from its origin below the Wachusett Reservoir, the Nashua River is still safe for swimming.
